mapper.select: SELECT model_name, model_year, model_fuel_type, model_fuel_efficiency, model_seater, model_transmission, model_navigation, model_camera_rear, model_highpass, model_blackbox, model_type, model_weekday_price, model_weenkend_price, model_options, model_picture, (SELECT AVG(review_evalscore) FROM review WHERE model_name = #{value}) evalScore, model_rental_count FROM model WHERE model_name = #{value}

SELECT m.model_name, m.model_year, m.model_fuel_type, m.model_fuel_efficiency, m.model_seater, m.model_transmission, m.model_navigation, m.model_camera_rear, m.model_highpass, m.model_blackbox, m.model_type, m.model_weekday_price, m.model_weenkend_price, m.model_options, m.model_picture, m.model_rental_count, Avg(r.review_evalscore) model_eval_score, Count(r.review_seq) FROM model m LEFT OUTER JOIN review r ON m.model_name = r.model_name GROUP BY m.model_name, m.model_year, m.model_fuel_type, m.model_fuel_efficiency, m.model_seater, m.model_transmission, m.model_navigation, m.model_camera_rear, m.model_highpass, m.model_blackbox, m.model_type, m.model_weekday_price, m.model_weenkend_price, m.model_options, m.model_picture, m.model_rental_count

SELECT m.model_name, m.model_year, m.model_fuel_type, m.model_fuel_efficiency, m.model_seater, m.model_transmission, m.model_navigation, m.model_camera_rear, m.model_highpass, m.model_blackbox, m.model_type, m.model_weekday_price, m.model_weenkend_price, m.model_options, m.model_picture, Avg(r.review_evalscore) model_eval_score, m.model_rental_count FROM (SELECT * FROM model WHERE model_type = #{type} AND model_name IN (SELECT DISTINCT model_name FROM car WHERE car_num NOT IN (SELECT car_num FROM rent WHERE #{startDate} BETWEEN rent_start_date AND rent_end_date OR #{endDate} BETWEEN rent_start_date AND rent_end_date OR rent_start_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} OR rent_end_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}))) m LEFT OUTER JOIN review r ON m.model_name = r.model_name GROUP BY m.model_name, m.model_year, m.model_fuel_type, m.model_fuel_efficiency, m.model_seater, m.model_transmission, m.model_navigation, m.model_camera_rear, m.model_highpass, m.model_blackbox, m.model_type, m.model_weekday_price, m.model_weenkend_price, m.model_options, m.model_picture, m.model_rental_count

SELECT m.model_name, m.model_year, m.model_fuel_type, m.model_fuel_efficiency, m.model_seater, m.model_transmission, m.model_navigation, m.model_camera_rear, m.model_highpass, m.model_blackbox, m.model_type, m.model_weekday_price, m.model_weenkend_price, m.model_options, m.model_picture, AVG(r.review_evalscore) model_eval_score, m.model_rental_count FROM model m left outer join review r ON m.model_name = r.model_name WHERE ROWNUM <= #{value} GROUP BY m.model_name, m.model_year, m.model_fuel_type, m.model_fuel_efficiency, m.model_seater, m.model_transmission, m.model_navigation, m.model_camera_rear, m.model_highpass, m.model_blackbox, m.model_type, m.model_weekday_price, m.model_weenkend_price, m.model_options, m.model_picture, m.model_rental_count

SELECT car_num FROM car WHERE model_name = #{modelName} AND car_num NOT IN(SELECT c.car_num FROM rent r left outer join car c ON r.car_num = c.car_num WHERE c.model_name = #{modelName} AND ( To_date(#{startDate}) BETWEEN r.rent_start_date AND r.rent_end_date OR To_date(#{endDate}) BETWEEN r.rent_start_date AND r.rent_end_date OR r.rent_start_date BETWEEN To_date(#{startDate}) AND To_date( #{endDate}) OR r.rent_end_date BETWEEN To_date(#{startDate}) AND To_date(#{endDate})))
